oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-05-14 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 14, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host/performer), guest performers Flatt & Scruggs, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Jimmie Selph, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1075th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Morgan; Archie Campbell; Flatt & Scruggs; Tommy Jackson; Jimmie Selph; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces George Morgan -- Tennessee Saturday Night (George Morgan) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, George Morgan) -- George Morgan introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, George Morgan) -- Grant Turner and George Morgan introduce Flatt & Scruggs -- Crying My Heart Out Over You (Flatt & Scruggs) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, George Morgan) -- George Morgan introduces Tommy Jackson and Jimmie Selph -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Tommy Jackson fiddle, Jimmie Selph calls) -- Grant Turner and George Morgan talk -- You'll Never Walk Alone (George Morgan) -- George Morgan introduces Chet Atkins -- Lambeth Walk (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Jackson, Tommy; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Selph, Jimmy; Campbell, Archie; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Pruett, Jack; Flatt, Lester; Scruggs, Earl; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Wiggins, Roy; Wilson, Smiley
